analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The reverse order of the dependent origination, the text of the conditions in triplets and couplets
The two sections on the short, the couplet on the conditions

original: Naparittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca mahaggataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a limited condition a great condition is a condition, being a condition by way of root condition. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate ekādasa.🔽Naparittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekādasa ārammaṇe ekādasa adhipatiyā nava pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate ekādasa  na paritta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca paritta ārammaṇaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: In the root cause there are eleven, in the object there are eleven, in the predominance there are nine … in the prenascence there are nine … in the non-disappearance there are eleven.🔽With a limited object a great condition is a condition, being a condition by way of root condition. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe terasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe terasa adhipatiyā nava pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate terasa
translated: In the root cause there are thirteen, in the object there are thirteen, in the predominance there are nine … in the prenascence there are nine … in the non-disappearance there are thirteen.
